messages.subject: Re: (no subject)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hey! Do those books belong to you? Cuz I ll buy em off you when you re done with them! I am having a very difficult time trying to get his books through
messages.messageBody:
> I am now reading John
>Holts books and they
>just reinforce everything I knew in my heart and logical mind.

Hey! Do those books belong to you? Cuz I'll buy 'em off you when you're
done with them! I am having a very difficult time trying to get his books
through the library. All copies are ALWAYS checked out. I have my name on
the list for one, and I hope to get it in a few days. I checked Amazon.com,
but some are on backorder and might be shipped in 3-5 weeks. Some aren't
even being printed anymore! I was hoping I wouldn't have to buy them new.

If anyone has any of his books and would be willing to lend them to me, I
will pay for shipping to/from, and I will treat them as if my life depended
on it!

Anyone? (sniff, sniff)

- - - - - - - -
Robin Stark
